EmailTemplate.subject: IB Information Evening, Tuesday 19 June
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
It is most exciting that your child is considering the IB!
Just to confirm that your booking for our IB Open Evening on Tuesday 19 June at 5.30pm.
Please enter the Senior College via the Ground Floor, Bishop Barry Centre, 51 Druitt Street, Sydney.
You will be greeted by our staff in the Foyer on arrival.
The evening commences at 5.30pm with a welcome from our Head of School, Dr Collier, followed by a presentation from our Director or Learning, Mrs Sharon Munro and past and current IB students. There will also be guest speakers on the evening.
We anticipate the presentations will conclude by 7.00pm.
To assist in the organisation of this tour, could you please advise:
1. Names and number of people attending; {!Lead.No_of_People_Attending__c}
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}, {!Lead.Other_Tour_Attendee_Name__c}
2. Academic Year and Calendar Year you are considering for your child (if you are not a current student);
{!Lead.Year_Group__c}, {!Lead.Year_of_Entry__c}
3. How you found out about St Andrewâ€™s Cathedral School; and
4. Anything you would like covered in the presentations or on the talk.
Please note it is important that you confirm your attendance.
Kindest regards
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Administrative Assistant
